text: Mach ave, uiv ŋakaz wɨram kɨra anɨŋnsar hanɨhan Yakŋ Ohɨrandɨv ahaz ore ŋgamamɨnd, wɨram untɨm ohɨra kɨra Judand, wɨram kɨra ya Mosesɨnd injambɨr ahe sɨkahɨnd, mach aiyopand emŋgemŋga hamen hanave awakŋi Jisasɨndɨv ya orɨmŋgɨmar. Ya orɨmŋgɨz mach raz Jisasɨh vɨhe omanaka uŋkɨri hɨrohe Pailatɨnd oman insɨŋ ŋgamŋgɨmar.
